description: This file defines the AgenticChunking class, a strategy for chunking documents using a language model (LLM) to determine natural breakpoints in text. It includes methods for initializing the chunking strategy, splitting documents into chunks based on model responses, and handling fallback scenarios.

classes.name: AgenticChunking
classes.description: A chunking strategy that uses a language model to identify natural breakpoints in text for splitting documents.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the AgenticChunking with an optional model and maximum chunk size.

methods.name: chunk
methods.description: Splits a Document into chunks based on model-determined breakpoints, considering semantic completeness and topic transitions.
